notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceptualization and design of the study: J.-W.N., K.-B.Y., and K.P. Data analysis and interpretation: J.H.H., and K.-B.Y. Preparing the first draft of the manuscript: J.-W.N., and Y.L. Critically reviewing the draft of the manuscript: J.-W.N., K.-B.Y., and Y.D.K. Supervision: K.P. Approving the final draft of the manuscript for publication: J.-W.N., K.-B.Y., Y.D.K., J.H.H., Y.L., and K.P. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
